Undertone: Sun-washed naturals + faded Oushak pigments (soft blues/corals)
Designer Note: Texture is the music here. The palette relies on the interplay between rustic wood (heart pine) and refined finishes (polished nickel, honed marble). The "Dark" dominant chord (Moody Teal) is perfect for a jewel-box scullery or a cozy, shiplapped den, meant to offset the brightness of a sunroom.
